headline: Garmin debuts the GPSMAP 15x3 chartplotter with a 15" ultrawide premium display
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's largest1 and most innovative marine electronics manufacturer, today announced the GPSMAP® 15x3 chartplotter, providing boaters, cruisers and sailors with an ultrawide 15-inch touchscreen for a stunning high-resolution display, superior clarity and a sleek design to optimize space in the helm. With an edge-to-edge glass format that fits a wide range of dash configurations, users can enjoy the advantages of dual screens without needing two separate units, making it

headline: Introducing Venu X1: Garmin's ultrathin smartwatch with an industry-leading 2-inch display
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN) today announced Venu® X1, setting new standards in the smartwatch industry with an ultrathin design, revolutionary 2-inch display and superior battery life. Venu X1 fuses a titanium caseback with a scratch-resistant sapphire lens and an easy-to-read AMOLED display—all with an 8mm watch case. It also features a built-in speaker and microphone so users can make and take calls from the wrist1, plus a bright LED flashlight that provides greater awareness in the dark. And with up
